reason: The XML_PARSER_VALIDATING configuration in the Batik software project is performance-sensitive because enabling validation during XML parsing can significantly increase the execution time and memory consumption. When validation is turned on, the parser must check the XML document against its schema or DTD, which adds overhead to the parsing process. This can lead to longer processing times, especially for large XML files, and increased memory usage due to the additional data structures required for validation. Therefore, changes to this configuration can have a notable impact on overall system performance.
